Text:
I agree that the actors weren't fully settled into their roles in season 1, but really - season 7 as one of the best? I thought it was, well not terrible, but just not right. Every character just changed to much, and not grew changed.

But anyway, respect to anyone trying to keep the Park alive. Personally I would happily watch season 72 if they'd carry on making it, and still laugh my arse off.
